entry.title: 🗣️ Reminder for the lean000rs Today @ 9:30pm, we have @dabit3 back hosting a "Getting Started Building on Lens Protocol" workshop 🌱 Then tomorr...
entry.summary:
🗣️ Reminder for the lean000rs Today @ 9:30pm, we have @dabit3 back hosting a "Getting Started Building on Lens Protocol" workshop 🌱 Then tomorrow @ 6pm UTC, we have @0xthresh dropping knowledge on Docker and how to use it in Web3 🧠 Be sure not to miss these, RSVP both 👇🏻
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): What's the best thing to do if you're tired of web2 social? 🤔 🏗️ Build something better. We're delighted to welcome back @dabit3 for an updated workshop on Lens... Getting Started Building on Lens Protocol 🌱 This Thursday @ 9:30pm UTC RSVP in the next post 👇🏻 https://t.co/HDlQ15TMz8
